situation: J was unsettled and unable to focus after a sudden change in the day's timetable due to unforeseen weather conditions.
action: The teacher aide sat down with J to go over a revised schedule using colour-coded blocks to visualize the new plan.
effect: J regained his focus and was able to participate actively in the day's activities, feeling reassured by the structured visual guide.
topic: Routine Disruptions - Changes in daily schedule or expected activities
